Funds are available for return and excess to need due to an error which duplicated the USCENTCOM Automated Multi-mission Spectrum Monitoring requirement in the FY 24-57 Internal ; Reprogramming for Israel Security Replacement Transfer Fund Tranche 2. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget item.

Funds are available for return because the amount transferred to Missile Defense Agency via FY 24-57 IR (Israel Security Replacement Transfer Fund Tranche 2) was in excess of the required amounts for development of advanced, high fidelity AN/SPY-1 Radar simulations to test system performance and train operators to perform in denied environments observed. This is a congressional special interest item and an emergency budget requirement.
